"A person who tries to dream
Go through difficulties "

en_text: Burn that flame bright,\Nand strive for your ideal place."
jp_text:
“たった１つの炎を燃やして
理想の場所を目指せ”
google_translated:
"Burning only one flame
Aim for the ideal location "

en_text: That is what it means.
jp_text: そういう意味よ

en_text: Noctu Orfei Aude Fraetor.
jp_text:
（アッコ）ノットオーフェ
オーデンフレトール

en_text: The second was at Blue Moon Abyss.
jp_text:
（アーシュラ）
２つ目は ブルームーンアビスで…
google_translated: The second is her Blomboon Abyss ...

en_text: That which is dreamed cannot be grasped.
jp_text: 夢見たものが手に入るんじゃない！
google_translated: I can not get a dream!

en_text: Phaidoari Afairrynghor.
jp_text:
（アッコ）
フェドアリーアフェルゴー

en_text: And the third you recited at the Samhain Festival.
jp_text: そして３つ目は 魔法祭で唱えた…
google_translated: And the third was changing at the magic festival ...

en_text: Open your heart!
jp_text: （アッコ）開け心よ！

en_text: Let's laugh together!
jp_text: 笑おう！ 一緒に！―

en_text: Arae Aryrha!
jp_text: アライアリーラ！

en_text: You and the Shiny Rod revived the lost Words.
jp_text: あなたとシャイニィロッドが―

en_text: I did?
jp_text: （アッコ）あたしが？

en_text: There are four Words remaining.
jp_text: （アーシュラ）言の葉は あと４つ

en_text: Four... what do they mean?
jp_text: ４つ… どんな意味なの？

en_text: That is for you to learn for yourself.
jp_text:
（アーシュラ）
それは これから あなたが
自分で知らなければならない
google_translated:
That's from now on you
I have to know myself

en_text: Do you know them, Professor?
jp_text: 先生は知ってるの？

en_text: All except for the very last.
jp_text: 最後の１つを除いてね

en_text: When you will have grown by your own power\Nand breathed life into all seven Words,
jp_text:
７つの言の葉 全てに
命を吹き込んだとき―
google_translated:
In all seven words of words
When lives bubble-

en_text: When you grow by your own power and have breathed life into all seven Words,
jp_text:
（アーシュラ）
あなたが自分の力で成長し―
google_translated: You grow with your own power-

en_text: the seal on the Grand Triskelion will break.
jp_text: グラントリスケルの封印が解ける

en_text: Professor, I finally got it!
jp_text: 先生！ とうとう分かったよ―

en_text: Chariot!
jp_text: シャリオ！

en_text: Chariot's been searching for the Words!
jp_text:
シャリオは 言の葉を
探してたんだ！―
google_translated:
Surio is a leaf of words
I was looking for!-

en_text: If I keep chasing after the Words too,\NI know I'll run into her!
jp_text:
私も 言の葉を追いかければ
きっと シャリオに会える！―
google_translated:
If I chase the leaves of words
Surely you can meet her chalio!-

en_text: I'll find them! All seven Words!
jp_text: 私 探す！ ７つの言の葉を！
google_translated: I look for!Seven words of words!

en_text: Even though I just learned another spell
jp_text: ♪覚えたての呪文じゃ

en_text: Yet my heart leaps out to meet them
jp_text:
♪イメージするのは
　　　　　　今より高く
google_translated:
♪ It is to image
More than now

en_text: Breaking my tiny shell one layer at a time
jp_text:
♪小さな殻
　　　何度も脱ぎ捨てて
google_translated:
♪ small shell
Take off again and again

en_text: I'll leave who I was yesterday behind
jp_text: ♪明日へきっと

en_text: Unfurling my transparent wings to the sky
jp_text:
♪透明な翼
　　　羽ばたかせたら

en_text: Putting together the shards of a starry sky that I found
jp_text:
♪見つけた星空の
　　　　　欠片(かけら)結んで

♪ I found a starry sky
Script
